question.name: Where is this toilet facility located?

option.name: I dont know where the emptier took the sludge

question.name: Is everyone in the household able to access and use the toilet at all times of the day and night?
What was the (main) reason that household members were unable to use the toilet at all times of the day or night?

option.name: The toilet is not always safe

question.name: The last time the chidren (0-5years) defecated, where did they defecate?

Are the disposable diapers safely disposed?
May I take a photo of your toilet facility?

option.name: Before, during, and after preparing food
After changing diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet
Before and after caring for someone at home who is sick with vomiting or diarrhea.
After handling animals (before and after milking, after contacts with animals, animal products or animal wastes)
After washing and disposal of a used diaper

question.name: Is a hand washing facility available?
Where do members of your household wash their hands?
Where is the hand washing facilities located?
Is there a durable handwashing facility with piped water or water storage, in a fixed and appropriate location
Is water available at the place for hand washing? (Observe)
Does the water have minimal handling or hands-free operation of the handwashing facility
Is the water collected and drained from the hand washing facility into a safe disposal point?
Is soap available at the hand washing facility? Observe
When do you wash your children's faces?

option.name: Every moring and every day before bed

question.name: May I take a photo of the handwashing station?
Take a photo of the handwashing station

option.name: Disposed of in designated waste disposal area
Disposed of within household yard or plot

question.name: Is there visible garbage in and around the household compound?

option.name: Disposed directly to open ground or water body
N/A (cooking, laundry and bathing is done away from the household)

question.name: Where does the sink drain to?
Are there adequate soak pits and drainage, with no visible erosion or liquid wastes in the household compound?
I am now going to ask you questions related to menstruation, are you comfortable and willing to answer the questions?

During your last period, Where did you wash and change?
During your last menstrual period, what hygiene materials did you mainly use?
Was the menstrual hygiene material affordable?
Where do you get your menstrual hygiene materials?
During your last periods, Did you miss any activities because you were on your menstrual periods?
During your last menstrual period, did you have access to soap for bathing?
During your last menstrual period, did you have access to soap for cleaning your menstrual material?
What do you usually do with your used menstrual material?

option.name: Throw it in the pit latrine

question.name: Is drinking water collected in clean covered containers
Does drinking water have any taste or colour?
Where is the drinking water point located?
Is the water source clean, protected and well-drained

How is cooked and uncooked food stored?
Where do you store your cleaned kitchen utensils?
Are the children under 5 years fully immunised (ask to observe the vaccination records)
Have all the under-5 children received a Vitamin A supplement in the last 6 months.
Are all infants exclusively breastfed until they are 6 months old?
In the last 7 days, did all under-2 children receive foods from the following food groups?
Does the household use insecticide-treated bed nets on all beds, or insect screens on all doors, windows and other openings into the house? (Observe)
Have all children and all at-risk adults received deworming treatment in the last 12 months
Is there visible standing water or untreated larval breeding sites in the household compound?

question.name: Do your household keep any animals or poultry?
